text: ==Events== ==Births== ===June births=== * June 15 – William Butler Ogden, president of the Chicago and North Western Railway (d. 1877). === August births === * August 9 – Joseph Locke, English civil engineer who became Chief Engineer on the Grand Junction Railway (d. 1860). === November births === * November 7 – Thomas Brassey, English railway contractor who supervised the construction of more than 6500 miles ( km) of track around the world (d. 1870).Helps, Arthur The Life and Works of Mr Brassey, 1872 republished Nonsuch, 2006 ===Unknown date births=== * George S. Griggs, pioneering master mechanic in American steam locomotive manufacturing (d. 1870). * William Swinburne, American locomotive designer and builder (d. 1883). ==Deaths== ==References== *
title: 1805 in rail transport
